channel.title: Works on random user oriented graphic design
channel.description: Recent content in Works on random user oriented graphic design

item.title: poster collection
item.description: Project: Collection of various poster designs | Client: rausr.com | Year: 2018-20XX Description: 1. Baracuda - fictive festival invitation 2. YSKD 2021 - logo application (part of logo contest) 3. Violence + Displays everywhere + Unlimited access + Kids = Problem? Not for modern parent right?

item.title: Light Wall visual
item.description: Project: Light Wall Print Design | Client: Madness | Year: 2021 Description: New advertising product from category large sized needs a new fresh visual. The wall is backlit with powerful LEDs, so that was the main reason why we want to used a high-contrast color ration. Final result is very promising.

item.title: logo collection
item.description: Project: Collection of various Logos | Client: rausr.com | Year: 2018-20XX Description: 1. Hokkaido - Logotype [concept] 2. Mynd - Brand indentity redesign [contest] 3. Rezort Piešťany - Logotype for Pieštany resort [contest] 4. Anomalia - Branding, naming and logotype 5. Sunder - Branding, naming and logotype for natural fruit juices producer [concept] 6. Turnmark - Branding, naming and logotype for traffic signs manufacturer

item.title: Ibelfaren Pets
item.description: Project: New pet food supplements brand - Packaging samples | Client: Ibelfaren Pets | Year: 2020 Description: Packaging samples for sub brand of Belgium healthy plant growth solutions. Ibelfaren pets and their probiotic tonikum increase the quality of your pets life. We created a badge from simple illustration (pictogram), sub brand name and short description of probiotic product. Few health targeted words above the badge with heart in the middle - which is a significant point of the whole supplement legacy.

item.title: Para Dogs are Paradox
item.description: Project: Naming, Branding and UX & UI for Paradox brand | Client: rausr.com | Year: 2020 Description: Dogs meets the parachute and that’s a Paradox. Working, moulding, bending absurd word connections always create something interesting. Next step was a transformation of this connection to some brand contours.

item.title: The Sun Also Rising
item.description: Project: Ernest Hemingway - The Sun Also Rises book cover | Client: rausr.com | Year: 2020 Description: My actual edition of this great Hemingway’s book is dressed in some senile cover. That’s why I decided to create a fresh modern cover that reflects every important part of whole piece.

item.title: various illustrations
item.description: Project: Collection of various illustrations | Client: rausr.com | Year: 2018-20XX Description: 1. Forhand - some dynamic ilustration 2. rausr - random users 3. New Year Jump [2018 to 2019 Yeah!] - PF illustration 4. Guitar Riffs - explicit random illustration 5. Histamaniac illustration - Histamine alergic reaction is very nice experience 6. Spotlight - using typography for creating complex images

item.title: Advertising systems eshop
item.description: Project: New ecommerce web design for presentation advertising systems | Client: Madness | Year: 2020 Description: Ecommerce UX & UI design for presentation advertising systems distributor. Designed was client’s, also admin’s interface. Special interface requests: client’s reviews, questions and answers, client’s orders (summary, status and history) and etc.

item.title: T3 events visual 2020
item.description: Project: T3works events visual for the year 2020 | Client: Madness - T3works | Year: 2020 Description: T3works and their modular & compact exhibition system are part of many Central European events. Every year they needs a fresh new visual, so this one is for TwentyTwenty.

item.title: Green Hills of Africa
item.description: Project: Ernest Hemingway - Green Hills of Africa book cover | Client: rausr.com | Year: 2020 Description: My actual edition of this great Hemingway’s book is dressed in some senile cover. That’s why I decided to create a fresh modern cover that reflects every important part of whole piece.

item.title: Pragovka art district
item.description: Project: Eventfest 2019 - exhibition stand visual | Client: Pragovka multi art & culture district | Year: 2019 Description: Templating and preparing print graphic for event exhibition stand. Used materials and techniques: pvc hard foam tables (plotting foil), baclite textile (sublimation print on textile).

item.title: Bollore Logistics - Wall
item.description: Project: Exhibition flexi & modular wall | Client: Bollore Logistics | Year: 2019 Description: Print design of flexibile and modular exhibition wall. High resolution print on the pvc popup panels with magnetic mounting system. Wall was used at some Austria carrier oriented event.

item.title: CNB - exhibition stand
item.description: Project: Exhibition stand & counter | Client: CNB - Czech National Bank | Year: 2019 Description: Exhibition stand and variable counter. Visual was produced on the stretch textile and backlit textile. Background pattern was created from coin shapes (extracted from design manual).

item.title: T3deco system microsite
item.description: Project: Wix single page microsite | Client: T3deco | Year: 2020 Description: Quick single page microsite which introduce main benefits of the modular interior system by T3deco company. Site is running on the Wix platform.

item.title: Konica Minolta exhibition
item.description: Project: Exhibition visual - Konica Minolta | Client: Konica Minolta | Year: 2019 Description: Konica Minolta - Technology show visual. Exhibition interpreted every business solution which company provides. Print material - PVC popup and PVC backlit.

item.title: ANOMALIA studio
item.description: Project: ANOMALIA studio | Client: ANOMALIA | Year: 2019 Description: Brand name, Logotype, UX & UI design for the small graphic studio ANOMALIA. Sad thing about this is short project lifetime - nice quick start and even quicker end :D

item.title: EMMA Magazine Advert
item.description: Project: EMMA Magazine advert | Client: Nu’Clinic | Year: 2018 Description: Print advertising for aesthetic and beauty clinic which was publicated in EMMA Magazine (one of the most popular Slovak female magazines)

item.title: CMCO exhibition wall
item.description: Project: Exhibition modular wall | Client: CMCO - COLUMBUS McKINNON | Year: 2019 Description: Unexpected “Hurry up” task for women’s beauty days event at client’s clinic.

item.title: Takeda exhibition stand
item.description: Project: Exhibition visual - Takeda | Client: Takeda | Year: 2018 Description: Takeda (Japanese pharmaceutical company) exhibition stand. Main keywords of the client’s request: traditional, white, clean, nature photo, wood.

item.title: Work Liberty exhibition
item.description: Project: Print design for Profesia Days event | Client: Work Liberty & Crezar | Year: 2019 Description: Print design and DTP services for the young work agency Work Liberty. Visual was used to participation at the Profesia Days - job opportunity event.

item.title: Nu'Clinic Promo Flyer
item.description: Project: Nu’Clinic Promo Flyer | Client: Nu’Clinic | Year: 2018 Description: Unexpected “Hurry up” task for women’s beauty days event at client’s clinic.

item.title: Slnko hrej CD cover
item.description: Project: Album Cover - Slnko, hrej! | Client: Lucia Briestenská | Year: 2016 Description: “Slnko, hrej!” is the debut album by singer-songwriter Lucia Briestenská. “Slnko, hrej!” in translation it means something like: “Sun, shine!”.
